# Clean Loaded Data

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data <- read.csv("../data/loaded.csv")
```

```{r}
# Drop NA and remove 
cleaned_data <- data %>%
  drop_na() %>% 
  select(-row.names)
```

```{r}
cat("Number of rows dropped:", nrow(data) - nrow(cleaned_data),"\n")
```

```{r}
cat("Number of colums dropped:", ncol(data) - ncol(cleaned_data),"\n")
```

```{r}
write_csv(x = cleaned_data, file = "../data/cleaned.csv")
```
